title: Homepage Load Performance and UI Rendering
description: Verify the homepage loads in under 2 seconds on various device types and all major browsers, with correct display of hero section, restaurant story, philosophy, and CTAs.

steps.description: Open the homepage URL on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
Verify homepage loads fully within 2 seconds
Verify the hero section content is visible and correctly formatted
Verify restaurant story and philosophy sections display all text and images with proper styling
Verify Call-To-Action buttons (CTAs) are clickable and linked

title: Menu Filtering and Search Functionality
description: Verify that filtering by categories and searching products responds instantly and returns accurate results according to input criteria.

steps.description: Navigate to the menu page
Apply a category filter and observe displayed products
Verify only products belonging to the selected category are displayed
Enter a product name in the search input
Verify displayed products match the search term, updating in real-time
Apply combined category filter and search term
Verify filtered and searched products correspond to both criteria

title: Detailed Product View Display
description: Verify that clicking on a product opens a detailed product page with accurate info, images, dietary indicators, and pricing.

steps.description: Navigate to the menu page
Click on a product to view details
Verify product title, description, price, and dietary indicators are displayed accurately
Verify all product images load properly and have correct alt text

title: Shopping Cart Quantity Management and Persistence
description: Verify that users can add products to the cart, adjust quantities, see correct subtotal and tax (IGV) calculations, and that the cart persists across sessions.

steps.description: Add multiple products to the shopping cart
Verify cart shows all items with correct quantities and prices
Increase and decrease product quantities
Verify subtotal and tax calculations update correctly
Refresh the browser or close and reopen the tab
Verify shopping cart contents and quantities persist

title: Checkout Form Validation and Submission
description: Verify that checkout requires required fields with proper validation, validates email and phone formats, and on successful submission produces a unique order confirmation with estimated preparation time.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout with items in the cart
Attempt submission with empty required fields
Verify validation error messages appear for each empty required field
Enter invalid email and phone formats
Verify validation errors for incorrect email and phone formats
Fill all required fields with valid data including pickup time and payment method
Submit the order
Verify order is accepted and a unique order number is displayed
Verify estimated preparation time is shown

title: Order Confirmation Email Delivery
description: Verify that upon checkout completion, an order confirmation email with unique order number and details is sent to the provided email address.

steps.description: Complete an order checkout with valid contact email
Verify email is received with correct order confirmation number and order details

title: Reservation Form Validation and Confirmation
description: Verify the reservation form validates date, time, number of persons inputs correctly, checks availability before accepting reservation, and sends a confirmation with unique reservation code.

steps.description: Navigate to the reservation page
Submit the form with missing required fields
Verify validation errors appear for missing fields
Input invalid date/time (past date, closed hours) or invalid number of persons (zero or negative)
Verify validation errors for invalid inputs
Input valid date, time, and number of persons
Submit the reservation form
Verify availability check passes and reservation is accepted
Verify unique reservation code is generated and displayed

title: Reservation Confirmation Email Delivery
description: Verify that after successful reservation, the customer receives a confirmation email containing the unique reservation code and reservation details.

steps.description: Complete a valid reservation
Verify confirmation email is received with reservation code and details

title: Admin Authentication and Route Protection
description: Verify that access to admin panel and all admin routes is protected by authentication middleware and unauthorized users cannot access or perform CRUD operations.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard URL without login
Verify redirection to login page or access denied
Login with valid admin credentials
Verify successful login and access to admin panel
Attempt to access admin API endpoints with invalid or missing authentication tokens
Verify API responses with appropriate unauthorized error status (e.g., 401)

title: Product CRUD Operations with Image Upload and Validation
description: Verify that admin can create, read, update, and delete products, including image uploads with size and format validations, and that deletion is prevented if products are referenced by orders.

steps.description: Login to admin panel and navigate to product management
Create a new product with all required fields and upload a valid image
Verify product is created and listed correctly including the image
Attempt to upload images with invalid formats or exceeding size limits
Verify validation errors prevent upload
Update an existing product's details and replace image
Verify product details and image update successfully
Attempt to delete a product that is referenced in existing orders
Verify deletion is prevented with appropriate error message
Delete a product which is not referenced
Verify product is removed successfully

title: Category Management CRUD and Prevent Deletion of Referenced Categories
description: Verify admin can create, edit, read, and delete product categories with proper validations and that deletion is prevented if categories are in use by products.

steps.description: Login and navigate to category management
Create a new category with valid data
Verify new category appears in list
Edit an existing category's name or description
Verify changes are saved and reflected
Attempt to delete a category assigned to one or more products
Verify deletion is prevented with an error message
Delete a category with no product references
Verify category is deleted successfully

title: Orders Management: Status Update, Filtering and Cancellation
description: Verify admin can view orders with filters (status, date), update order statuses, cancel orders, and that UI updates immediately reflecting these changes.

steps.description: Login to admin panel and open orders management
Apply filters by order status and date range
Verify order list matches the filter criteria
Select an order and update its status to next valid status
Verify status updates immediately in UI and data persists after refresh
Cancel an active order
Verify order is marked cancelled and cannot be updated further

title: Reservations Management: Search, Validation, and Confirmation
description: Verify admin can search reservations by unique reservation code or customer email, validate reservation details, update or cancel reservations, and view confirmation status.

steps.description: Login and navigate to reservation management page
Search for reservations by reservation code
Verify matching reservation details are displayed
Search for reservations by customer email
Verify all reservations linked to the email appear
Update reservation details where allowed
Verify changes are saved and shown immediately
Cancel a reservation
Verify reservation status updates immediately to cancelled

title: API Endpoint HTTP Status Codes and Error Handling
description: Verify all public and admin API endpoints return correct HTTP status codes for successful and erroneous requests, including 200, 201, 400, 401, 403, 404, and 500 as appropriate.

steps.description: Send valid GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests to product, category, order, reservation endpoints with proper authentication
Verify responses return success status codes with expected payloads
Send requests with missing required fields or invalid data
Verify 400 Bad Request with descriptive error messages
Send requests with invalid or missing authentication tokens to protected endpoints
Verify response status 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden
Request non-existing resource IDs
Verify 404 Not Found responses
Simulate server errors where possible
Verify 500 Internal Server Error responses with appropriate messages

title: Real-Time UI Updates with React Query for Orders and Reservations
description: Verify that updates (status changes, cancellations) to orders and reservations by admin reflect immediately in the UI using real-time data fetching and React Query cache updates.

steps.description: Open orders/reservations management page and note current list and statuses
Perform status update or cancellation on an order/reservation
Verify the list updates in real-time without requiring manual refresh
Verify subsequent navigation or page refresh shows updated state persisted

title: Shopping Cart Correct Subtotal and Tax (IGV) Calculation
description: Verify the shopping cart calculates subtotal and tax correctly on adding, updating, and removing items, and under edge cases such as zero quantity or maximum allowed quantity.

steps.description: Add single product to cart and note listed price
Verify subtotal equals product price times quantity
Add multiple products with different prices
Verify subtotal sums prices correctly
Change quantities to zero and maximum quantity limits
Verify subtotal and IGV tax values update accordingly without errors
Remove items from cart
Verify cart updates subtotal and tax correctly and shows empty cart message if needed

title: Checkout Pickup Time Validation
description: Verify the pickup time selector in checkout only allows valid times, rejects past or closed hours, and shows appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Open checkout page with items in cart
Select a pickup time in the past
Verify validation error prevents submission
Select pickup time during restaurant closed hours
Verify validation error is shown
Select valid pickup time within operating hours
Verify time is accepted and submission succeeds if other fields are valid

title: Admin Dashboard Accessibility and Navigation
description: Verify that all admin panel navigation elements and sidebars function properly, routes navigate as expected, and UI components (sidebar, header) render correctly on various screen sizes.

steps.description: Login as admin and explore dashboard and subpages
Verify sidebar links and top navigation are clickable and navigate to correct pages
Verify dashboard content and widgets load properly
Resize browser window to mobile and tablet sizes
Verify responsive layout and usability of navigation elements
